item.title: Using SonarCloud with ASP.NET Core, Angular and github actions
item.description: This article demonstrates how to implement code analysis and Static Application Security Testing (SAST) using SonarCloud and GitHub Actions. The solution involves building a secure web application with ASP.NET Core for the backend and an Angular UI for the frontend, following a backend-for-frontend security architecture. Both the ASP.NET Core (C#) codebase and the Angular (TypeScript [â€¦] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/05/13/using-sonarcloud-with-asp-net-core-angular-and-github-actions/
